name: Path Of The Outcast
description:
A Top down pixel art game made in 48 hours for LoJam by our Team of 4 people. The theme for the Game Jam was "where we're going we don't need roads". Path Of The Outcast won the award for Best Use of the Game Jam Theme.

Two versions available for download:

  • Xbox Controller Version
  • Keyboard Version

Music and Sound Effects by Connor Grail

  • https://connorgrail.com/

Defend yourself and see how many days you can last!!
